CustomField.description: This field indicates whether the Release Event is a "Base" event, that is, the event happens at the time indicated by the Release record's Scheduled Release Date.
CustomField.formula: IF(agf__Day_Offset__c = 0 && agf__Event_Duration__c = 0 && ISBLANK(agf__Start_Time__c) && agf__Minute_Offset__c =0 && agf__Hour_Offset__c = 0, "BASE EVENT", "")
CustomField.label: Base Event
